name: UofA Cosmology Codes
body:
### Mission
To successfully share codes between multiple contributors and to build up code documentation all in one central space.

### List of repos
* [cosmothon](http://cosmoaz.github.io/cosmothon)

### Getting started

* create a github account
* ask to be added to the CosmoAZ organization
* ask for an account on `cosmo.physics`


### Code Documentation
There will be documentation here soon

### Support or Contact
Contact @alexabate
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
